fields.name: A4 Lever Arch File
fields.one_line_heading: Heavy-duty lever arch for large documents
fields.description: A4 lever arch file built to handle big filing jobs. Reinforced spine and strong metal clip give reliable long-term performance. The finger hole makes retrieval from shelves easy. Label holder on the spine helps with quick identification. Smooth opening mechanism ensures pages are not damaged. Ideal for offices, archives and long-term storage.
fields.key_features:
Reinforced spine
Strong metal lever clip
Finger hole for easy pull-out
Label holder on spine
Durable cardboard cover
Holds up to 500 sheets

fields.name: Clear Plastic Document Folder (Pack)
fields.one_line_heading: Transparent folders to protect and present documents
fields.description: These clear plastic folders protect documents while keeping contents visible. They are lightweight and water-resistant, making them practical for everyday use. The smooth finish prevents snagging or tearing. Keeps certificates and reports neat for presentations. Suitable for students and professionals alike. Economical pack for classrooms and offices.
fields.key_features:
Transparent PP material
Water resistant
Smooth edges
Pack of assorted colors
Lightweight and flexible
Reusable

fields.name: Expandable Accordion File
fields.one_line_heading: Multi-pocket expanded organizer for receipts & bills
fields.description: Accordion-style expandable file with multiple pockets for categorizing documents. Each pocket is clearly labelled, making retrieval effortless. The strong gusseted design expands to accommodate bulkier papers. Elastic strap closure keeps contents secure while on the move. Comfortable handle allows convenient carrying between meetings. A practical solution for home and office filing.
fields.key_features:
Multiple numbered pockets
Durable gusseted base
Elastic closure strap
Carry handle
Label tabs included
Holds receipts and bills

fields.name: Clip Folder with Transparent Cover
fields.one_line_heading: Clip-style folder for quick document access
fields.description: Clip folder provides fast access to documents without punching holes. The transparent front shows the cover page clearly, ideal for presentations. Strong metal clip secures up to 60 sheets comfortably. Lightweight design fits easily into briefcases and backpacks. Durable construction for frequent use. Great for reports, project submissions and class handouts.
fields.key_features:
Transparent front cover
Strong metal clip
No punching required
Holds ~60 sheets
Reusable and sturdy
Portable design

fields.name: Ring Binder A4 (2-Ring)
fields.description: Classic 2-ring binder built for durability and frequent handling. The internal rings close tightly to prevent page slippage. Strong covers maintain shape even when full. Spine label slot for quick indexing. Smooth ring operation for easy page addition or removal. An office essential for organized record keeping.
fields.key_features:
Tough outer cover
Secure ring locking
Label slot on spine
Holds punched A4 sheets
Long-lasting hardware
Smooth ring action

fields.name: Document Storage Box
fields.one_line_heading: Stackable storage box for files and archives
fields.description: Large capacity document storage box for archiving and transporting files. Constructed from sturdy cardboard with reinforced corners. Snap-on lid keeps dust and moisture away. Built-in handles allow easier lifting and movement. Label area on the side for identification. Ideal for long-term document storage and office moves.
fields.key_features:
Strong cardboard build
Snap-on lid
Stackable design
Side label area
Reinforced corners
Holds many documents

fields.name: Report File with Slide Clip
fields.description: Lightweight report file with a slide clip to hold reports together neatly. Clear front pocket displays a cover sheet for quick identification. Economical option for students and offices for short-term reports. Smooth inner surface reduces page wear. Compact and stackable for easy storage.
fields.key_features:
Slide clip fastening
Clear front pocket
Lightweight
Economical
Good for short-term use
Easy to store

fields.name: Plastic Button Folder
fields.one_line_heading: Affordable button-closure folder for everyday use
fields.description: Plastic button folder with secure snap button closure. Water-resistant and flexible for easy insertion of documents. Practical for quick sorting and carrying small sets of papers. Comfortable to carry and pocket-friendly. A budget-friendly, functional choice for regular users.
fields.key_features:
Button snap closure
Water-resistant
Flexible plastic
Portable and light
Affordable
Good for small documents

fields.name: Certificate Holder File
fields.one_line_heading: Premium certificate holder with protective cover
fields.description: Premium certificate holder designed to protect important documents and diplomas. Leatherette finish offers a professional look. Inside pockets keep certificates flat and secure. Excellent gift or archival storage option. Soft interior lining prevents scratches. Built to preserve valuable paperwork for years.
fields.key_features:
Leatherette finish
Flat certificate pockets
Soft interior lining
Secure closure
Professional appearance
Durable build

fields.title: Very sturdy organizer
fields.content: The expanding compartments help me separate receipts by month. Strong material and easy to carry.

fields.title: Exactly what I needed
fields.content: Lots of pockets and clear tabs. A bit bulky but works well for home accounting.

fields.title: Good quality
fields.content: Feels strong and durable, perfect for organising documents.

fields.title: Clear and practical
fields.content: These folders are handy for keeping loose papers visible and protected.

fields.title: Good pack
fields.content: Worth the price for classroom use. Transparent and light.

fields.title: Excellent organizer
fields.content: The pockets and elastic strap keep everything neat. Highly recommended.

fields.title: Very useful
fields.content: Helps me sort bills and receipts, good build too.

fields.title: Good capacity
fields.content: Spacious and robust enough for monthly paperwork.

fields.title: Practical clip file
fields.content: Great for quick presentations. The transparent front is useful.

fields.title: Holds papers well
fields.content: Clip is strong and the cover protects the document.

fields.title: Very good binder
fields.content: Sturdy rings and nice cover. Useful for office filing.

fields.title: Great value
fields.content: Keeps sheets safe and organized.

fields.title: Perfect storage box
fields.content: Good for moving files around and stacking.

fields.title: Solid build
fields.content: Durable and easy to store.

fields.title: Good report file
fields.content: Works fine for school reports, nothing special.

fields.title: Affordable
fields.content: Nice for quick use, cheap and serviceable.

fields.title: Good snap closure
fields.content: Keeps documents safe and dry.

fields.title: Compact and handy
fields.content: Perfect for small sets of papers and receipts.

fields.title: Premium look
fields.content: Great for storing certificates. Looks and feels premium.

fields.title: Keeps them safe
fields.content: Holds certificates flat and protected.
